title: Provided further that in case there is more than one land rate applicable to different parts of the plot under the CDS, a weighted average of all the applicable rates shall be taken for calculating the Average Land Rate and the Basic Ratio
clause_text: Provided further that in case there is more than one land rate applicable to different parts of the plot under the CDS, a weighted average of all the applicable rates shall be taken for calculating the Average Land Rate and the Basic Ratio.
